pages.text: Solar of the Agglomerate recovery caster's health. $(br2)$(t:Raising these attributes for functional spells increases the benefit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Benefit attributes：$(/t)$(t:Raising the Force can increase gains)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force$(/t)$()$(br2) When the height position of the spell is greater than 192 blocks, it will change the current weather to clear.
